name: Penguin Crimes
description:
Goal: Work your way up from petty to simple to grand larceny without getting caught. 

Challenge: You are a penguin.

Art created in Canvas.

Music:

 La Pompe Du Trompe by Shane Ivers - https://www.silvermansound.co

Want to support me and my work? Buy me a ko-fi!

Please let me know if any coding errors occur. Everything should be playable at this point, but the game has only been tested a few times. Thank you so much :)
